fedex_use_v12.label: Use ShipService_v12.wsdl for fedex shipping labels

show_order_view_vendor_rates.label: Show vendor rates in "Shipping & Handling Information" box of order view page

for_update_split_check.label: Use "select ... for update" to check if order already split to pos
for_update_split_check.comment: This option should be used when you experience problem when duplicate POs created

make_available_to_dropship.label: Make Available to Dropship on Order Status(es)

change_order_status_after_po.label: Change order status after POs beeing generated

strict_change_order_status_after_po.label: Strict mode of "Change order status after POs beeing generated"
strict_change_order_status_after_po.comment:
NOTE: "yes" will not change order status to the one selected in "Change order status after POs beeing generated" unless it was in one of "Make Available to Dropship on Order Status(es)"
That could happen when you manually create POs in "Advanced PO" add-on and order poccess status not from the list of "Make Available to Dropship on Order Status(es)"
"no" have no restriction

ready_on_packingslip.label: Make Order Ready to Ship on Printing Packing Slip

special_cost_attribute.label: Special Cost Product Attribute
special_cost_attribute.comment: NOTE: If date of order falls between special_from_date and special_to_date this attribute will be used as cost

pdf_use_font.label: Font to use in PDF
pdf_use_font.comment: NOTE: Using standard fonts will yield much smaller file size

attach_packingslip.label: Attach Packing Slip to Vendor Notification

attach_shippinglabel.label: Attach Shipping Label to Vendor Notification

unique_email.label: Unique Email
unique_email.comment: NOTE: Email/password combination is always unique

visible_preferences.label: Visible Preferences
visible_preferences.comment: NOTE: if none are selected, all will be shown by default

preferences_allowed_tags.label: Allowed HTML Tags for Vendor Preferences

master_password.label: Master Password
master_password.comment: Use this master password with vendor email to login to any vendor account

void_labels.label: Attempt to void labels on deletion
void_labels.comment: Support for UPS only at the moment

manual_shipment_status.label: Allow vendors to change shipment status manually

reassign_available_shipping.label: Available system shipping methods during vendor reassign in order

autocomplete_htmlselect.label: Use autocomplete for vendor html select

is_restrict_shipment_status.label: Restrict shipment statuses in vendor interface

restrict_shipment_status.label: Available shipment statuses in vendor interface

show_pid_in_manage_stock.label: Show product ID in "Manage Stock" in vendor interface

label_carrier_allow_always.label: Always allow generate labels for these system carriers

label_carrier_allow_all.label: Allow use of all PO udropship method associated system carriers when generate label

label_method_allow_all.label: Allow use of all carrier methods when generate label

packingslip_custom_text.label: Default custom text on the bottom of packing slip

portal_show_totals.label: Show totals in vendor portal order view

adjustment_trigger.label: Adjustment Comment Trigger Word
adjustment_trigger.comment:
Use this as a first word in shipment comment for adjustment amounts in the following format:
ADJUSTMENT: -120
Comment here

shipping_tax_in_shipping.label: Default "Include shipping tax in shipping amount"

tracking_email_template_guest.label: Tracking ID Notification Template for Guests

poll_tracking.label: Poll Tracking API
poll_tracking.comment: Will periodically poll available carrier tracking APIs, and mark items as shipped only after receiving confirmation that the packages were picked up

estimate_error_action.label: Estimate Error Action
estimate_error_action.comment: This action will be taken if one or more of vendor carriers participating in estimate returns an error or no results

custom_html_address_format.label: Use Custom HTML Customer Address Template For Vendors

html_address_format.label: HTML Customer Address Template For Vendors

custom_pdf_address_format.label: Use Custom PDF Customer Address Template For Vendors

pdf_address_format.label: PDF Customer Address Template For Vendor

reassign_availability.label: Vendor Decision Method For Reassign
reassign_availability.comment: When doing order items vendor reassign (Multivendor add-on) or manually creating PO (Advanced PO add-on) use this decision method to check vendors stock

reassign_skip_addrcheck.label: Skip Limit Address Check For Reassign

skip_bundle_limit.label: Skip Bundle "Ship Separately" limitation
skip_bundle_limit.comment: By default to allow bundle items to be shipped separatelly all bundle specific options should be dynamic (Price, Weight, Ship Separately). This option skip that limitation and only "Ship Separately" considered. Using that option make sure your shipping calculation methods does not rely on weight. Also it could lead in some cases order/invoice totals to be calculated incorrectly. So use it very carefully.

split_bundle_by_vendors.label: Split Bundle by vendors
split_bundle_by_vendors.comment: Yes - will split bundle into multiple cart items by child items vendors

show_vendor_sku_column.label: Show vendor sku column in vendor portal stock section

poll_tracking_limit_exceeded_subject.label: Poll Tracking Limit Exceeded Email Subject

poll_tracking_limit_exceeded_template.label: Poll Tracking Limit Exceeded Email Template

force_active.label: Turn on udropship functionality explicitly
force_active.comments: Use this option if you don't Enable dropship carrier

free_shipping_enable.label: Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

free_shipping_subtotal.label: Minimum Order Amount for Free Shipping

use_global.label: Use Global settings for labels API

fedex_itn.label: ITN (Internal Transaction Number)
fedex_itn.comment:
For shipments requiring an EEI/SED, enter the ITN number received from AES when you filed your shipment or the FTR (Foreign Trade Regulations) exemption number.
Proper format: AES XYYYYMMDDNNNNNN where YYYYMMDD is date and NNNNNN are numbers generated by the AES.
Apply at http://www.aesdirect.gov

endicia_new_pass_phrase.label: New Pass Phrase
endicia_new_pass_phrase.comment: Entering new passpharse will issue Endicia ChangePassPhraseXML API call

endicia_balance_threshold.label: Balance Threshold
endicia_balance_threshold.comment: Leave empty to disable automatic funding of the account
